LanguageSettings.title: Language Settings
LanguageSettings.description: Choose in what language you want to use Paperflow. This setting affects all your interactions with the platform.

Validator.title: Document Validation
Validator.subtitle: Upload a document to verify its signatures and authenticity
Validator.errorHelp: - Please try again or check the document.
Validator.aboutDescription: Paperflow Validator checks digital signatures in your documents to verify their authenticity and integrity.
Validator.apiDescription: The validation is facilitated by the Skribble Validator API. Paperflow doesn't save any documents on our servers - all validation history is stored only in your browser. However, Skribble may store validation information on their end.

quality.label: Signature Quality
quality.helper: Set the minimum signature quality required for validation

tooltips.SES: Basic level of signature security, suitable for low-risk transactions
tooltips.AES: High security with strong identification, suitable for most business transactions
tooltips.QES: Highest legal value, equivalent to handwritten signature, suitable for high-value transactions

legislation.label: Legislation
legislation.helper: Choose which legislation framework to comply with

tooltips.CH: Swiss legal framework for electronic signatures (ZertES)
tooltips.EU: European Union eIDAS regulation for electronic signatures
tooltips.CH_EU: Compliance with both Swiss and EU regulations

infos.label: Additional Information
infos.helper: Select what additional information to include in validation results

tooltips.validation: Detailed information about the validation process and results
tooltips.format: Technical details about the document format and structure
tooltips.signer: Information about the document signers and their certificates

rejectVisualDifferences.label: Reject Visual Differences
rejectVisualDifferences.description: Fail validation if visual differences are detected

rejectUndefinedChanges.label: Reject Undefined Changes
rejectUndefinedChanges.description: Fail validation if undefined changes are detected

DocumentUploader.info: Upload a signed document to verify its digital signatures and authenticity.
DocumentUploader.dragDrop: Drag and drop your document here
DocumentUploader.validatingDescription: We're checking the document's signatures and authenticity. This may take a few moments.

ValidationResults.validSignatureContent: This document contains {count} valid signature{plural} and meets all validation requirements.
ValidationResults.invalidSignatureContent: This document has issues with {count} signature{plural} or has been modified since signing.
ValidationResults.invalidSignatureContentWithSettings: This document does not meet your validation requirements.

failureReasons.quality: Signature quality ({actual}) is lower than the required level ({required}).
failureReasons.legislation: Document legislation ({actual}) doesn't match the required framework ({required}).
failureReasons.visualDifferences: Visual differences detected but are rejected in settings.
failureReasons.undefinedChanges: Undefined changes detected but are rejected in settings.

ValidationResults.signatureInfoDescription: Information about the digital signatures found in this document, including quality and validation status.
ValidationResults.certificateDescription: This official document confirms that the validation was performed and records the results. The certificate is tamper-evident, time-stamped, and can be used for verification purposes.

Certificate.title: Document Validation Certificate
Certificate.subject: Subject:
Certificate.attestation: This certificate attests to the validation status of the document at the time of validation.
Certificate.longTermValidationRequired: Long-term validation is required by settings
Certificate.visualDifferencesRejected: Visual differences are rejected by settings
Certificate.undefinedChangesRejected: Undefined changes are rejected by settings

apiErrors.qualityRequirement: Signature quality does not meet requirements
apiErrors.longTermValidationRequired: Long-term validation is required but not present
apiErrors.visualDifferencesRejected: Visual differences detected but not allowed
apiErrors.undefinedChangesRejected: Undefined changes detected but not allowed

History.title: Validation History
History.subtitle: View your previous document validations
History.noHistoryDescription: Your document validation history will be stored here. Validate a document to get started.
History.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all validation history? This cannot be undone.

Tooltips.documentInfo: Basic information about the validated document, including file details and validation status.
Tooltips.validDocumentStatus: This document has been verified and all signatures are valid.
Tooltips.invalidDocumentStatus: This document has issues with one or more signatures or has been modified since signing.
Tooltips.invalidDocumentSettingsStatus: This document doesn't meet the validation requirements set in your settings.
Tooltips.requirementsNotMetStatus: The document has valid signatures but doesn't meet all your validation requirements.
Tooltips.signatures: Information about the digital signatures found in this document, including quality and validation status.
Tooltips.signaturesCount: The number of digital signatures detected in this document.
Tooltips.validSignatures: The number of valid signatures compared to the total signatures found.
Tooltips.signatureQuality: The highest quality level of signatures (QES: Qualified, AES: Advanced, SES: Simple).
Tooltips.legislation: The regulatory framework that applies to this document's signatures (e.g., eIDAS for European Union).
Tooltips.longTermValidation: Indicates if the signature includes timestamps and validation data for long-term verification.
Tooltips.visualDifferences: Indicates if there are visual differences between the signed and displayed document.
Tooltips.undefinedChanges: Indicates if the document has been modified after signing in ways not covered by the signature.
Tooltips.signerInfo: Detailed information about each signer and their digital signature.
Tooltips.qesSignature: Qualified Electronic Signature: Highest legal value, equivalent to handwritten signature.
Tooltips.aesSignature: Advanced Electronic Signature: High security with strong identification.
Tooltips.sesSignature: Simple Electronic Signature: Basic level of signature security.
Tooltips.validSignature: This signature is cryptographically valid and hasn't been tampered with.
Tooltips.invalidSignature: This signature has validation issues and may not be trustworthy.
Tooltips.signatureQualityLevel: The level of assurance and legal value provided by this signature.
Tooltips.signerLegislation: The regulatory framework under which this signature is evaluated.
Tooltips.signerLongTermValidation: Indicates if this signature includes data for long-term verification beyond certificate expiration.
Tooltips.certificateInfo: Technical details about the digital certificate used to create this signature.
Tooltips.validationCertificate: A downloadable certificate that proves this document was validated by Paperflow.

ValidationHistory.title: Validation History
ValidationHistory.subtitle: View your document validation history
ValidationHistory.clearHistoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all validation history?
ValidationHistory.deleteEntryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
